# margin struct

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/margin
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:08:36.148240

---

Specifies the gap outside each edge separating a `widget` from its neighbors.
Distance is measured in units where `1.0` unit is the width of a pixel at 1080p resolution.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `Left` | `float` | The left edge spacing. |
| `Top` | `float` | The top edge spacing. |
| `Right` | `float` | The right edge spacing. |
| `Bottom` | `float` | The bottom edge spacing. |
